text: I *always* forget about events at the office. Maybe others will disagree, but can we get invites on our calendars? If others don’t want it, I’ll start being better about putting it on my own calendar.
yeah, that seems to be an issue for everyone…. All events are currently on the team calendar but maybe you’re right, they should go out to all cals
I’m working on coming up with a new events process, which includes figuring out how to better inform the studio and get more people to actually attend events. i’ll consider this in the plan
for sure. I hope that you can make it today!
When is the events meeting this week?
